title: Troubleshoot High Latency on a Live Stream
description: Viewers are complaining that a live stream has a very long delay (latency) compared to the real-world event.

tasks.description: Check the configuration of the streaming encoder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the encoder is using a very large segment size, which increases latency.

tasks.description: Check the CDN configuration for any caching settings that might increase latency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the CDN settings are optimized for low latency.

tasks.description: Instruct the stream operator to adjust the encoder settings to use a smaller segment size to reduce latency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions to the operator, and stream latency improves.
